comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Robert M. Sweitzer (1868-1938) ran twice (unsuccessfully) for Mayor of Chicago: genealogytrails.com/ill/cook/chicagobios2.html More pictures here: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=80478089

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Many more photos of Sweitzer from the LOC's American Memory project and the Chicago Daily News: memory.loc.gov/ammem/cdnquery.html

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: pennylrichardsca, we will add Robert in our catalog record.
